channel.title: vscode on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in vscode on Today I Learned

item.description: that Cmd+D selects the next occurence of the currently-highlighted text in VS Code! Thanks to Mark Brewer for teaching me this!
that you can hold shift+alt (linux) or shift+opt (mac) and click to select box of rows and columns in VS Code. See https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/tips-and-tricks#_column-box-selection
How to avoid opening live-share sessions in the web vscode version that I hate: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/liveshare/quickstart/browser-join#joining-from-the-desktop
That in vscode, you can make your keypresses display on-screen using the “Developer: Toggle screencast mode” command.

To add JSON schema validation to e.g. Cargo.toml files in VSCode using tamasfe.even-better-toml, you can add a special comment: #:schema https://json.schemastore.org/cargo.json # see https://taplo.tamasfe.dev/configuration/directives.html#the-schema-directive
